ygData.msgSnippet: Release 1.0.4 was made to address a pretty nasty bug that had whitespaces showing up in the middle of mimetypes and URIs in crawl.log and on the ARC metadata

Subject: Release 1.0.4
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=168599281

Release 1.0.4 was made to address a pretty nasty bug that had 
whitespaces showing up in the middle of mimetypes and URIs in crawl.log 
and on the ARC metadata line ('[1010966] crawl.log has URIs with spaces 
in them': 
https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?func=detail&atid=539099&aid=1010966&group_id=73833).  
See the crawler.archive.log to download.
Yours,
St.Ack
